name: SKSearchType
desc: Search Kit ignores the constants in this group. Use asynchronous searching with SKSearchCreate instead, which uses query syntax to determine search type.

items.name: var kSKSearchRanked: SKSearchType
items.desc: Deprecated. Specifies a basic ranked search.

items.name: var kSKSearchBooleanRanked: SKSearchType
items.desc: Deprecated. Specifies a query that can include Boolean operators including '|', '&', '!', '(', and ')'.

items.name: var kSKSearchRequiredRanked: SKSearchType
items.desc: Deprecated. Specifies a query that can include required ('+') or excluded ('-') terms.

items.name: var kSKSearchPrefixRanked: SKSearchType
items.desc: Deprecated. Specifies a prefix-based search, which matches terms that begin with the query string.
